parameters.description: A list of attributes of this User Control.

name.description: Name of the attribute in the HTML.

propertySetterName.description: Name of the attribute property setter (can be empty string or missing if the attribute is readonly).

propertyGetterName.description: Name of the attribute property getter.

displayName.description: Name which should be presented the user.

visible.description: Determine if an attribute is shown to the user.

themeable.description: Determine if the attribute can be changed by a theme. Defaults to standard.

type.description:
The type of the attribute gives the tchmi creator a hint to use a custom editor for this attribute.
The corresponding schemas are described as dataTypes.

allowedFunctions.description: A definition of functions which are allowed to use here. The functions must match the requiredArguments signature.

returnType.description:
The type of the attribute gives the tchmi creator a hint to use a custom editor for this attribute.
The corresponding schemas are described as dataTypes.

requiredArguments.description: A list of arguments which will be filled from the control itself. They are not changeable in the creator.

type.description:
The type of the attribute gives the tchmi creator a hint to use a custom editor for this attribute.
The corresponding schemas are described as dataTypes.

category.description: Name of the area this attribute will be listed in the creator.

description.description: A long description of this attribute.

requiredOnCompile.description: The attribute has to be set in the HTML. Otherwise the control is not valid.

refTo.description:
The name of an attribute which contains information relevant for this attribute.
The engineering will use this information to optimize position of attribute inputs.
Example: MeasurementUnits are shown in the same row as the main value.

readOnly.description: Readonly attributes do not need a setter.

bindable.description: Defines if this is bindable to a Symbol.

heritable.description: This attribute can be overwritten by a inheritance child.

defaultValue.description: This value will be used as sample value while control is generated in engineering (for example while drop). If set to null the attribute will not be set.

defaultValueInternal.description: This value is the internal default value of the attribute if no valid value exists. This value must be valid for this attributes.

virtualRights.description: Additional virtual rights for the User Control

items.description: An access right which is checked by controls. In the Schema a defaultValue of true mean access is granted, false is denied, null is ask parent.

name.description: Name of the access definition in the HTML.

displayName.description: Name which should be presented the user.

visible.description: Determine if an access definition is shown to the user.

description.description: A long description of this access definition.

defaultValueInternal.description: Defines the default of this control access right. This will be used if the check for this access right does not return a result. true mean access is granted, false is denied, null is ask parent.

description.description: A long description of this User Control.
